Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the prevention of discrimination
Summary: Relates to the prevention of discrimination; replaces the term "sexual harassment" with "discrimination".
LawCode: Amd §139-l, St Fin L; amd §§7515 & 5003-b, CPLR, amd §§17-a & 18-a, Pub Off L; amd §5-336, Gen Ob L; amd §201-g, Lab L; amd §§296-d, 292 & 63, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the civil practice law and rules, the public officers law, the general obligations law, the labor law and the executive law, in relation to discrimination
